overview: Christopher Wheeldon, today one of the world's most sought-after choreographers, used the popular story of Cinderella as a jumping-off point for an up-to-date, cinematic ballet spectacle.  Together with a team of international artists, he's given this well-know fairy tale a new look.  His Cinderella is an experience, full of humour and virtuosic dance to which a generous sprinkling of magic has been added.
title: Cinderella (Dutch National Ballet)
